user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, durable, and well-fitting underwear that would accommodate my size and provide all-day comfort.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would fit well without being constricting. The secure fit and non-binding waistband were key features that attracted me, as I wanted something that wouldn't require constant adjustments throughout the day. The positive reviews from other customers, particularly those in larger sizes, also influenced my decision, as I wanted to ensure I was making a good choice for my needs.

I needed breathable and comfortable underwear that would keep me cool throughout the day. The features like moisture-wicking and ventilation were important to me, especially given my size. The fact that other customers reported no shrinkage or wear after washing gave me confidence in the product's durability, which was a significant factor in my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer a good fit and comfort, especially for larger sizes. I value high-quality materials that provide durability and maintain their shape after washing. Features like waterproofing in footwear and moisture control in clothing are important to me, as they enhance usability in various conditions. I also appreciate items that are designed specifically for big and tall individuals, ensuring that they fit well in all areas without being too tight or restrictive. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are easy to care for and maintain their appearance over time. On the other hand, I dislike items made from cheap materials that do not provide adequate comfort or fit, particularly when they are too tight or have inadequate pocket sizes. I also find it frustrating when clothing shrinks significantly after washing, affecting the fit.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable, durable underwear that fits well and provides all-day comfort for my size. within my expected price range: [25.54, 27.59]
What specific material do you prefer for your underwear, such as cotton, modal, or synthetic blends?

I prefer underwear made of high-quality cotton or modal blends for their comfort, breathability, and durability. These materials tend to provide a good fit and maintain their shape well after washing.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear> / Item ID: B08YFLPPDM / Price: $14.18 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Hipster Underwear offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features the ultra soft waistband that won't pinch or bind. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Made from ultra soft, breathable ring-spun cotton these panties will keep you feeling fresh all day with Cool Comfort wicking technology. These panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Hipster Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Men's Premium Tag-Free Cotton Underwear (Regular & Big Man)> / Item ID: B09ZVRTGF7 / Price: $16.02 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['The Fruit of the Loom Premium Collection will take your favorite everyday underwear and undershirts to the next level. Made with Premium Eversoft ring spun cotton that provides premium softness wash after wash. We are proud of the hard work we put into the fit of each product, which is why we back every purchase with our Best Fit Guarantee.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Fruit of the Loom Women's Eversoft Cotton Hipster Underwear, Tag Free & Breathable, Available in Plus Size> / Item ID: B0B15GQCC1 / Price: $9.29 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Start your day bright-eyed and cotton-bottomed with Fruit of the Loom®'s newly reinvented cotton hipsters. The style you love is now softer than ever and built for all day comfort. We've used a finer yarn to create a wonderfully soft feel that will have you ready to tackle the day. These hipsters come with a durable, plush-backed waistband that is guaranteed to remain ravel free wash after wash, and as always, our Fruit of the Loom® panties are tag free and made with a 100% cotton liner for ultimate comfort. These hipsters feature a moderate rise with full seat coverage."]

Item No.3 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort® fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."]
